Writing A Blog

June 24, 2016

This is my first blog post ever. I've always thought it would be cool to keep a blog. There are so many entrepreneurs out there who advocate keeping a blog to generate passive income. But there's one big problem.

All of these bloggers only write about one thing: how spectacular it is to generate passive income by creating a blog. That's right, all of these entrepreneurs make money off of blogging, by writing about how to make money by blogging. It's pretty meta and if you read too many of these blogs, you will quickly find yourself inside a dizzying echo chamber.

So now that I am finally writing a blog, I suppose it's only right that my first post is indeed about writing a blog. And you now what? It's pretty easy to make a blog. The bad news is I'm not making money off of it. Yet. It's all just for Turing for now. But it's great to kick off Module 2 by doing something I've been wanting to do for a long time. Now I just need to find some interesting things to share.

Like this day-to-night photo of Africa by Stephen Wilkes:
